tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces

Interface IABUniversalAdId


  • public interface IABUniversalAdId
    An abstraction of the IAB definition of Universal Ad ID. For more details on the IAB Universal Ad ID, please refer to section 3.7.1 in the VAST 4.0 spec: https://www.iab.com/guidelines/digital-video-ad-serving-template-vast-4-0/.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getIdRegistry()
      Get the registry of the universal ad ID, which is a string used to identify the URL for the registry website where the unique creative ID is cataloged.
      java.lang.String getIdValue()
      Get the value of the universal ad ID, which is a string for the unique creative ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdRegistry

        java.lang.String getIdRegistry()
        Get the registry of the universal ad ID, which is a string used to identify the URL for the registry website where the unique creative ID is cataloged.
        Returns:
        the registry string.

      • getIdValue

        java.lang.String getIdValue()
        Get the value of the universal ad ID, which is a string for the unique creative ID.
        Returns:
        the value string.
